comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:6.0.2) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/6.0.2
Build ID: 20110902133214

Steps to reproduce:

I clicked on the desktop link which was generated in V6 by bookmarking a link and then dragging the bookmark to the desktop


Actual results:

In Version 7.0 when I click on the desktop link I get an error box with a can't find the file message. The file then opens, but leaves the error box open too. Reverting back to V6 solves the problem 


Expected results:

The file should have opened without first going to an error box
